notes.text:
For my amazoness build, I decided to go with chalice instead of sticking powerful rebirth in to avoid clogging up the back-row with too many continuous traps. Sphere kuriboh saved me multiple times since amazoness princess and baby tiger can be serious LP liabilities. You can always swap in cosmic cyclone for SK or chalice to have a the upper hand in the mirror match - otherwise hope you go first so you can set up onslaught before your opponent. I also feel like 3 princess and 3 onslaught are necessary as it makes the spellbook matchup easier. Most cases they can banish 2 onslaught but run out of fuel for the third.
TLDR: fun deck, foxy ladies
Also, prismatic princess drop
